verses.verse: Bless <WH1288> the Lord <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>. O Lord <WH3068> my God <WH430>, you are very <WH3966> great <WH1431>; you are clothed <WH3847> with honor <WH1935> and majesty <WH1926>.
Who cover <WH5844> yourself with light <WH216> as with a garment <WH8008>: who stretch out <WH5186> the heavens <WH8064> like a curtain <WH3407>:

Who lays the beams <WH7136> of his chambers <WH5944> in the waters <WH4325>: who makes <WH7760> the clouds <WH5645> his chariot <WH7398>: who walks <WH1980> upon the wings <WH3671> of the wind <WH7307>:
Who makes <WH6213> his angels <WH4397> spirits <WH7307>; his ministers <WH8334> a flaming <WH3857> fire <WH784>:
Who laid <WH3245> the foundations <WH4349> of the earth <WH776>, that it should not be removed <WH4131> for ever <WH5769>.
You covered <WH3680> it with the deep <WH8415> as with a garment <WH3830>: the waters <WH4325> stood <WH5975> above the mountains <WH2022>.
At <WH4480> your rebuke <WH1606> they fled <WH5127>; at the voice <WH6963> of your thunder <WH7482> they hurried away <WH2648>.
They go up <WH5927> by the mountains <WH2022>; they go down <WH3381> by the valleys <WH1237> unto the place <WH4725> which <WH2088> you have founded for them <WH3245>.
You have set <WH7760> a bound <WH1366> that they may not pass over <WH5674>; that they turn not again <WH7725> to cover <WH3680> the earth <WH776>.
He sends <WH7971> the springs <WH4599> into the valleys <WH5158>, which run <WH1980> among the hills <WH2022>.
They give drink <WH8248> to every animal <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>: the wild donkeys <WH6501> quench <WH7665> their thirst <WH6772>.
By them shall the birds <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064> have their habitation <WH7931>, which sing <WH5414> among <WH996> the branches <WH6073>.
He waters <WH8248> the hills <WH2022> from his chambers <WH5944>: the earth <WH776> is satisfied <WH7646> with the fruit <WH6529> of your works <WH4639>.

He causes the grass <WH2682> to grow <WH6779> for the cattle <WH929>, and herb <WH6212> for the service <WH5656> of man <WH120>: that he may bring forth <WH3318> food <WH3899> out of the earth <WH776>;

And wine <WH3196> that makes glad <WH8055> the heart <WH3824> of man <WH582>, and oil <WH8081> to make his face <WH6440> to shine <WH6670>, and bread <WH3899> which strengthens <WH5582> man <WH582>'s heart <WH3824>.
The trees <WH6086> of the Lord <WH3068> are full <WH7646> of sap <WH730>; the cedars of Lebanon <WH3844>, which he has planted <WH5193>;
Where the birds <WH6833> make their nests <WH7077>: as for the stork <WH2624>, the fir trees <WH1265> are her house <WH1004>.
The high <WH1364> hills <WH2022> are a refuge <WH4268> for the wild goats <WH3277>; and the rocks <WH5553> for the conies <WH8227>.
He appointed <WH6213> the moon <WH3394> for seasons <WH4150>: the sun <WH8121> knows <WH3045> his going down <WH3996>.
You make <WH7896> darkness <WH2822>, and it is night <WH3915>: where all the animals <WH2416> of the forest <WH3293> do creep forth <WH7430>.
The young lions <WH3715> roar <WH7580> after their prey <WH2964>, and seek <WH1245> their food <WH400> from God <WH410>.
The sun <WH8121> arises <WH2224>, they gather themselves together <WH622>, and lay them down <WH7257> in their dens <WH4585>.
Man <WH120> goes forth <WH3318> unto his work <WH6467> and to his labor <WH5656> until the evening <WH6153>.
O Lord <WH3068>, how manifold <WH7231> are your works <WH4639>! in wisdom <WH2451> have you made <WH6213> them all <WH776>: the earth is full <WH4390> of your riches <WH7075>.
So is this great <WH1419> and wide <WH7342> sea <WH3220>, where are things creeping <WH7431> innumerable <WH4557>, both small <WH6996> and great <WH1419> animals <WH2416>.
There go <WH1980> the ships <WH591>: there is that leviathan <WH3882>, whom you have made <WH3335> to play in it <WH7832>.
These wait <WH7663> all upon you <WH5414>; that you may give them their food <WH400> in due season <WH6256>.
That you give <WH5414> them they gather <WH3950>: you open <WH6605> your hand <WH3027>, they are filled <WH7646> with good <WH2896>.
You hide <WH5641> your face <WH6440>, they are troubled <WH926>: you take away <WH622> their breath <WH7307>, they die <WH1478>, and return <WH7725> to their dust <WH6083>.
You send <WH7971> forth your spirit <WH7307>, they are created <WH1254>: and you renew <WH2318> the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>.
The glory <WH3519> of the Lord <WH3068> shall endure for ever <WH5769>: the Lord <WH3068> shall rejoice <WH8055> in his works <WH4639>.
He looks <WH5027> on the earth <WH776>, and it trembles <WH7460>: he touches <WH5060> the hills <WH2022>, and they smoke <WH6225>.
I will sing <WH7891> unto the Lord <WH3068> as long as I live <WH2416>: I will sing <WH2167> praise to my God <WH430> while I have my being <WH5750>.
My meditation <WH7879> of him shall be sweet <WH6149>: I will be glad <WH8055> in the Lord <WH3068>.

Let the sinners <WH2400> be consumed <WH8552> out of the earth <WH776>, and let the wicked <WH7563> be no more <WH1288>. Bless you the Lord <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>. Praise <WH1984> you the Lord <WH3050>.
